data.subject: ComfyUI-JNodes
data.q: What is the purpose of the Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct for ComfyUI-JNodes?
data.a: The purpose of the Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct is to foster an open and welcoming environment and ensure that participation in the project is a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of various personal attributes.

data.subject: ComfyUI-JNodes
data.q: What are some examples of behavior that contributes to a positive environment for ComfyUI-JNodes?
data.a: Examples include using inclusive language, being respectful of differing viewpoints, gracefully accepting constructive criticism, focusing on what is best for the community, and showing empathy towards other community members.

data.subject: ComfyUI-JNodes
data.q: What can project maintainers do if a contributor does not align with the Code of Conduct?
data.a: Project maintainers have the right and responsibility to take appropriate and fair corrective action, including removing, editing, or rejecting contributions, or banning a contributor temporarily or permanently.

data.subject: ComfyUI-JNodes
data.q: Who can be reported for instances of unacceptable behavior in the ComfyUI-JNodes community?
data.a: Instances of inappropriate behavior can be reported to mattias@mattiaswallander.com. All complaints will be reviewed and investigated, and a response deemed necessary and appropriate to the circumstances will be provided.

data.subject: ComfyUI-JNodes
data.q: Where can I find more details about the enforcement of the Code of Conduct for ComfyUI-JNodes?
data.a: You can find answers to common questions about this code of conduct at <https://www.contributor-covenant.org/faq>.
